00001 #ifndef _CACHE_HH_
00002 #define _CACHE_HH_
00003   
00004 #include "util/configuration.hh"

00006 
00007 template
00008     <
00009       typename HomType
00010     , typename NodeType
00011     >
00012 class Cache
00013 {
00014 private:
00015   mutable size_t peak_;
00016   
00017   typedef typename  hash_map< std::pair<HomType, NodeType>, NodeType >::type 
00018                     hash_map; 
00019   hash_map cache_;
00020     
00021 public:
00022   Cache () : peak_ (0) {};
00023     
00025   void clear (bool keepstats = false) {
00026     peak();
00027     cache_.clear();
00028   }
00029 
00030   size_t peak () const {
00031     size_t s = size();
00032     if ( peak_ < s )
00033       peak_ = s;
00034     return peak_;
00035   }
00036 
00037 
00038   size_t size () const {
00039     return cache_.size();
00040   }
00041 
00042     std::pair<bool,NodeType>
00043     insert(const HomType& hom, const NodeType& node)
00044     {
00045       bool found;
00046       
00047       { // lock on current bucket
00048         typename hash_map::const_accessor access;
00049         found = cache_.find ( access, std::make_pair(hom,node));
00050         if (found)
00051           return std::make_pair(false, access->second);
00052       } // end of lock on the current bucket
00053       
00054       // wasn't in cache
00055       NodeType result = hom.eval(node);
00056       // lock on current bucket
00057       typename hash_map::accessor access;
00058       bool insertion = cache_.insert ( access, std::make_pair(hom,node));
00059       if (insertion) {
00060         // should happen except in MT case
00061         access->second = result;
00062       }
00063       return std::make_pair(insertion,result);
00064     }
00065   
00066 
00067     
00068 };
00069 
00070 #endif /* _CACHE_HH_ */
